name: Pacman Clone (davidalmarinho)
description:
Hi, this was a clone that I really liked to make. It is open-source, so you can see the code right here: Pacman Clone Java

So, I am showing you my work, I hope you enjoy it! :D

- - - - - - - - - - -

How to play:

Move pacman using arrow keys and escape from the ghosts

Fullscreen may be enabled pressing 'F' key
